Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 2 Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka » 2.5 Kusalattika, Hetuhetusampayuttaduka » 2.5.1 Hetuhetusampayuttapada » 2.5.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Hetuhetusampayuttaduka
Hetuhetusampayuttapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
28.
1038Kusalaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1039Akusalaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1040Abyākataṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
29.
1041Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1042Naadhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  navippayutte tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1043Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1044Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1045(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
